sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker"> <x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <date_of_declaration>2020-12-14</date_of_declaration> <defaulter_members>SUMPOORNA PORTFOLIO LIMITED</defaulter_members> <directors_partners>NITESH AGGARWALA RAHUL YADAV MANOJ KUMAR</directors_partners> <number>DEF0001012</number> <reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter>1) Non-availability of client funds and securities 2) Shortfall in net worth 3) Recording of fictitious entries in the Register of Securities 4) Non-settlement of client accounts 5) Non-resolution of investor complaints</reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>feb164bb2f71091051dad5f62799b660</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_updated_on> </x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker> </record_update>
